languages.text: {n}Каллигос скалится, мгновенно взвинтившись до раскаленного гнева.{/n} "Судить меня вздумал? Меня? Вольного Торговца? Ну давай, обнажи оружие, посмотрим, чего стоят хваленые Арбитес — и пса своего бери, я один управлюсь с вами двумя!"

{n}Calligos snarls, flying instantly into a white-hot fury.{/n} "You think you can judge me? Me, a Rogue Trader? Draw your weapon, then, and we will see what the much-lauded Arbites are worth. Feel free to call your dog to help — I will handle you both myself!"
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос скалится, мгновенно взвинтившись до раскаленного гнева.{/n} "Судить меня вздумал? Меня? Вольного Торговца? Ну давай, обнажи оружие, посмотрим, чего стоят хваленые Арбитес — и пса своего бери, я один управлюсь с вами двумя!"

{n}Calligos snarls, flying instantly into a white-hot fury.{/n} "You think you can judge me? Me, a Rogue Trader? Draw your weapon, then, and we will see what the much-lauded Arbites are worth. Feel free to call your dog to help — I will handle you both myself!"

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯暴跳如雷，咆哮起来。{/n}“你以为你有权评判我？我可是行商浪人！既然如此，拔出你的武器吧，我打算亲自试试受人敬仰的法务官有多少斤两。尽管叫你的狗帮忙，我会亲手把你们两个全宰了！”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos snarls, flying instantly into a white-hot fury.{/n} "You think you can judge me? Me, a Rogue Trader? Draw your weapon, then, and we will see what the much-lauded Arbites are worth. Feel free to call your dog to help — I will handle you both myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯暴跳如雷，咆哮起来。{/n}“你以为你有权评判我？我可是行商浪人！既然如此，拔出你的武器吧，我打算亲自试试受人敬仰的法务官有多少斤两。尽管叫你的狗帮忙，我会亲手把你们两个全宰了！”

languages.text: {n}Calligos gruñe, consumido por una furia cegadora.{/n} «¿Se cree que puede juzgarme? ¿A mí, que soy Comerciante Independiente? Prepare su arma, veamos de qué es capaz el tan cacareado Arbites. Llame a su perro, ¡me ocuparé de los dos yo solo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos snarls, flying instantly into a white-hot fury.{/n} "You think you can judge me? Me, a Rogue Trader? Draw your weapon, then, and we will see what the much-lauded Arbites are worth. Feel free to call your dog to help — I will handle you both myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos gruñe, consumido por una furia cegadora.{/n} «¿Se cree que puede juzgarme? ¿A mí, que soy Comerciante Independiente? Prepare su arma, veamos de qué es capaz el tan cacareado Arbites. Llame a su perro, ¡me ocuparé de los dos yo solo!».

languages.text: {n}Calligos lâche un grondement et cède immédiatement à une colère noire.{/n} « Vous vous croyez en droit de me juger ? Moi, un libre-marchand ? Dégainez votre arme et nous verrons ce que vaut vraiment l'Arbites ! N'hésitez pas à lâcher votre chien, je m'occuperai de vous deux sans problème ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos snarls, flying instantly into a white-hot fury.{/n} "You think you can judge me? Me, a Rogue Trader? Draw your weapon, then, and we will see what the much-lauded Arbites are worth. Feel free to call your dog to help — I will handle you both myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos lâche un grondement et cède immédiatement à une colère noire.{/n} « Vous vous croyez en droit de me juger ? Moi, un libre-marchand ? Dégainez votre arme et nous verrons ce que vaut vraiment l'Arbites ! N'hésitez pas à lâcher votre chien, je m'occuperai de vous deux sans problème ! »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスはうなり声をあげ、瞬時に激しい怒りに燃えた。{/n}「お前ごときが、この俺を裁けるとでも思っているのか？この俺を、自由開拓者であるこの俺を！武器を構えろ。高等裁定局とやらがどれほどのものか、見せてもらおうじゃないか。犬も呼んで構わん。まとめて相手をしてやる！」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos snarls, flying instantly into a white-hot fury.{/n} "You think you can judge me? Me, a Rogue Trader? Draw your weapon, then, and we will see what the much-lauded Arbites are worth. Feel free to call your dog to help — I will handle you both myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスはうなり声をあげ、瞬時に激しい怒りに燃えた。{/n}「お前ごときが、この俺を裁けるとでも思っているのか？この俺を、自由開拓者であるこの俺を！武器を構えろ。高等裁定局とやらがどれほどのものか、見せてもらおうじゃないか。犬も呼んで構わん。まとめて相手をしてやる！」

languages.text: {n}Calligos, hırlayarak anında öfkeye kapılıyor.{/n} "Beni yargılayabileceğini mi sanıyorsun? Beni, bir Hür Tacir'i? O zaman silahını çek de o çok övülen Arbites mensuplarının değerini görelim. Köpeğini de yardıma çağır hatta, ikinizi de tek başıma hallederim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos snarls, flying instantly into a white-hot fury.{/n} "You think you can judge me? Me, a Rogue Trader? Draw your weapon, then, and we will see what the much-lauded Arbites are worth. Feel free to call your dog to help — I will handle you both myself!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos hırlayarak anında öfkeye kapılıyor.{/n} "Beni yargılayabileceğini mi sanıyorsun? Beni, bir Hür Tacir'i? O zaman silahını çek ve çok övülen Arbites mensuplarının değerini görelim. Köpeğini de yardıma çağır hatta, ikinizi de tek başıma hallederim!"

languages.text: {n}Calligos knurrt, und sein Zorn erreicht sofort maximale Stärke.{/n} "Ihr glaubt, Ihr könnt über mich urteilen? Mich, einen Freihändler? Zieht Eure Waffe, dann werden wir sehen, was die hochgelobten Arbites wert sind. Und holt ruhig Euren Hund zu Hilfe – ich werde mit Euch beiden fertig!"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos snarls, flying instantly into a white-hot fury.{/n} "You think you can judge me? Me, a Rogue Trader? Draw your weapon, then, and we will see what the much-lauded Arbites are worth. Feel free to call your dog to help — I will handle you both myself!"

Zieht Eure Waffe, dann werden wir sehen, was die hochgelobten Arbites wert sind. Und holt ruhig Euren Hund zu Hilfe – ich werde mit Euch beiden fertig!"
